meanings.definition: A close male friend from one's neighborhood or hometown.
meanings.sent1: My homeboys and I always hang out at the park after school.
meanings.sent2: I've known my homeboys since we were kids.
meanings.sent3: When my homeboys and I get together, it's always a good time.
meanings.sent4: Even though we've all grown up, my homeboys will always be like brothers to me.
meanings.sent5: The bond between me and my homeboys is unbreakable.

meanings.definition: A member of one's peer group or gang.
meanings.sent1: The homeboys in our gang always have each other's backs.
meanings.sent2: He's been a loyal homeboy ever since we started this crew.
meanings.sent3: Our homeboys make the best team when it comes to playing basketball.
meanings.sent4: Being a homeboy means standing by your friends through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: The loyalty among us homeboys is unmatched.

meanings.definition: A person who grew up in the same area as oneself.
meanings.sent1: I bumped into an old homeboy from my childhood at the grocery store.
meanings.sent2: It's always nice to catch up with homeboys from the old neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: Meeting a homeboy from back in the day brought back so many memories.
meanings.sent4: Even though we've all moved away, the bond with my homeboys remains strong.
meanings.sent5: The shared experiences with my homeboys shaped who I am today.
